name: Paper Plane Pilot (vs. Panic-Pirate-Parrots)
description:
Jiro dreams of being on day able to fly his own plane. In his dreams he starts off by flying his paper plane. Let him enjoy his dream as long as possible until he hits an obstacle and wakes. You can protect yourself by throwing paper balls.

It's time for you to reach the highscore!

Inspired by Studio Ghibli's "The Wind Rises".
